meanings.sent1: She kept saying the same thing redundantly.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were repeated redundantly to ensure everyone understood.
meanings.sent3: The parrot comically repeated the word redundantly.
meanings.sent4: His speech was like a broken record, playing redundantly.
meanings.sent5: The alarm beeped redundantly until someone turned it off.

meanings.definition: Characterized by unnecessary repetition or duplication
meanings.sent2: The system had a redundant backup in case of failure.
meanings.sent3: His outfit was redundantly colorful, with clashing patterns.
meanings.sent4: The old clock ticked redundantly, reminding him of time passing.
meanings.sent5: The extra buttons on the remote seemed redundantly placed.
